column4: I don't know what the solution would be but the most active bug thread on the problem you're having is here: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.20/+bug/99659
Someone in the thread mentions a solution at http://wiki.ubuntu.com/DebuggingSoundProblems worked
Thanks.  I'mm have a read through it all and check out those possible solutions.
I'll post back here if anything is successful
